q: the arc. Allen Iverson couldn't have picked Linas Kleiza out of a crowd when he came over from Philadelphia three months ago but said the second-year forward was the catalyst for the Nuggets' biggest win since the trade. I didn't know who he was when I got here, but a nationally televised game, I think a lot of people around the world know who he is now, Allen Iverson said. Speaking of corporate shake-ups, Mountain View Internet juggernaut Google revealed that co-founder Larry Page will become CEO effective April 4. Current CEO Eric Schmidt will be executive chairman, and co-founder Sergey Brin will remain co-founder, devoting his time and energy to strategic projects, Eric Schmidt wrote in a blog post. "We definitely see a connection between all of this activity," says Stuart Schear, Vice President for communications for the Planned Parenthood Federation of America. These organizations are working very much together with the legislative agenda of defunding Planned Parenthood in mind. Planned Parenthood has had its funding threatened before.
